name: Biryani
description: Biryani is a classic Bangladeshi dish featuring fragrant rice cooked with marinated meat, spices, and aromatic herbs. Served with a side of cucumber salad and raita, it's a flavorful and aromatic delight.

name: Hilsha Curry
description: Hilsha Curry is a traditional Bangladeshi fish curry made with tender pieces of Hilsha fish, cooked in a rich, spicy gravy with mustard oil and served with steamed rice. It's a mouthwatering blend of flavors and textures.

name: Khichuri
description: Khichuri is a comforting and hearty Bangladeshi dish made with rice and lentils, often mixed with vegetables and spices. It's best enjoyed with a side of fried eggplant and a dollop of ghee.

name: Kacchi Biriyani
description: Kacchi Biriyani is a Bangladeshi version of the classic dish made with marinated raw meat and aromatic spices, layered with basmati rice and slow-cooked to perfection. The meat is tender, flavorful, and slightly spicy, making it a favorite at Bangladeshi gatherings.

name: Chingri Malai Curry
description: Chingri Malai Curry is a creamy and flavorful Bangladeshi prawn curry cooked with coconut milk, spices, and served with steamed rice. It's known for its mild yet delicious taste.

name: Chicken Chap
description: Chicken Chap is a delectable Bangladeshi dish made with tender pieces of chicken cooked with aromatic spices and herbs. It's a flavorful and satisfying delicacy.

name: Mejban
description: Mejban is a traditional Bangladeshi dish where meat, often beef, is cooked and shared with the community. It's a symbol of hospitality and unity in Bangladesh.

name: Fizza
description: Fizza is a delightful Bangladeshi dessert made with a sweet, crispy crust filled with flavored cream and topped with a variety of fruits and nuts. It's a popular choice for those with a sweet tooth.
